author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sanne Group ‍Announces Result Of Secondary Placing Of Ordinary Shares
text:
April 5 (Reuters) - Sanne Group PLC:
* ‍ANNOUNCES THAT SELLING SHAREHOLDERS HAVE, SUBJECT TO COMPLETION, SOLD 3,610,355 ORDINARY SHARES IN COMPANY​
* ‍PLACING SHARES WERE PLACED AT A PRICE OF 660P PER SHARE * SELLING SHAREHOLDERS HAVE SOLD 3.6 MILLION ORDINARY SHARES IN CO, REPRESENTING APPROXIMATELY 2.5 PERCENT ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL OF SANNE​
* ‍SETTLEMENT OF PLACING IS EXPECTED TO TAKE PLACE ON 9 APRIL 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
